title: I need some help
body: I recently  downloaded LoL and it worked the first day but when I tried the next day I started having issues. When I clicked the icon on my desktop top it brought up the patcher and when I clcked launch it did not bring up the login page I did not receive any error. When I tried clicking the icon again it gives me a message saying there is another process of the LoL running I went to the net and looked up all the processes tied to LoL and terminated them and tried running it again and the same issue happened I brought up the patcher hit launch and it didn't bring up the sign in page. I've been trying to fix it for a while now and I've hit a brick wall if anyone has this issue and has had it fixed can you tell me what I need to do.

replies.body:
This issue often happens as a result of a poor connection to the login servers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if those steps resolve this.

Let me know what changes you see as a result of that guide.

Here is what it said.
Starting

F:\
Getting user profile... Done
C:\Users\Justin
Creating the "LoL Logs" folder... Done

Everything is Ok
It  still is having the issue.
It looks like this is the log from the Hextech Repair Tool. Did the steps in the connection guide not change anything, then?

No, I was talking with a friend of mine who has been trying to help figure this out one of the things he mentioned is reformatting my computer I don't mind doing that but if either you or him can come up with a better solution that would be cool. I've tried some of the fixes and they did not work.
I recommend trying them *all*, then letting me know if you see any change.
